thread.title: Kevin O'Connell
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Kevin O'Connell

author: Kevin O'Connell
title: Kevin O'Connell
text: I was very nervous about my tax situation, the staff at Optim Tax service made this situation pain-free as possible. I would recommend them to anybody who has a tax problem and wants and who wants to solve it quickly and efficiently. Optimum made a bad situation easy thanks again for all your help
